description.2: is an online replacement for a student notebook. It's made for teachers and students, primarily with music schools in mind, but it can be used in any field. Teachers can create classes, add students to them and send out tasks for students. The students can join classes and manage their tasks - complete or add more of them. It is a mobile application written in React Native with a Node.js server and a database.

features.title: Features:
features.3: remotely assigning tasks to students as a teacher
features.5: infrastructure designed with user data security in mind

nh.title: Productivity focused Chromium extension
nh.description: Chromium extension replacing default new tab with custom productivity focused home.

features.title: Features:
features.3: Spotify API integration -> currently playing track
features.4: Google Calendar API integration -> current task
features.5: daily stoic phrase from stoic quotes API

sla.description: Application allowing multiple people (watchers) to listen along to one spotify playback controlled by one person (streamer).

react-native-boring-avatars.description: Simple React Native implementation of Boring Avatars.Fixes blurry svg problem from other React Native implementations.

flight-route.description: Application that calculates data needed for a flight plan based on input data and a route drawn on an OpenLayers map.

scraper.description: CLI application that scrapes the barchart website for stock price data. Implemented with apt cooldown period between requests so as not to overload the website servers.
